short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to specify a background image and a city's weather for displaying it in every new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you are like me poping new tabs all the time and you think that by default tabs are boring then this extension is for you, i will keep updating it and adding new features and animations. For the moment it has three animations and allows you to personalize very much time and date's formats; also it supports a weather API that displays humidity and tempeture of a specified location.
